name: Snake Puzzle HD
description:
A game for old and young.

Put together pictures of beautiful snakes. If you like snakes, you will like this game too!
New with HD textures. Viper, Python and Cobra await you

features:
◉ Adjustable difficulty level
◉ Relaxing background music
◉ HD textures

Intuitive operation ensures a great feeling. No ads, no in-app purchases. Suitable for children.

Leave us a review and follow us on Twitter to be informed about the latest updates and other games:
https://twitter.com/TankbusterGames
